mapper.insert: INSERT INTO vmb.mod(username, password, type, boards) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{type, typeHandler=com.github.vimboard.mapper.GroupTypeHandler}, #{boards, typeHandler=com.github.vimboard.mapper.ModBoardsTypeHandler})
mapper.select: SELECT id, username, password, type, boards FROM vmb.mod WHERE username = #{username} LIMIT 1
